title: In Harry Potter, who founded the Order of the Phoenix? - Quora
tags: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2007 movie)
Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2003 book)

response.answer_text: This has been answered simply by three people, but all of those answers have been collapsed despite upvotes because (I’m assuming) they were not long enough, so I’m filling in some verbiage so that maybe mine will stay up. The answer, as those others have already so astutely said, is Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore.
